title: Bug 42724: StyledText selection rendered incorrectly on bidi platforms
description: The selection background is rendered incorrectly on bidi platforms. It seems unnecessary to redraw the entire selection background because there is code in StyledTextRenderer.drawLine that creates a style range for the selection.
OB: The selection background is rendered incorrectly on bidi platforms, including unselected characters in the background.
EB: The expected behavior is that the selection background should only include the characters within the selection and should not extend to unselected characters.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Build version: 20030903
2. Use the attached BidiUtil.
3. Type one English character followed by three or more Arabic/Hebrew characters.
4. Place the caret at the beginning of the line.
5. Select the next two characters, including one bidi character.
6. Observe that the selection background includes unselected characters.
